subject: New York City Marathon
Running
Marathon Running
Forests and Forestry
lead_paragraph: Kenyan marathon runners Hosea Rotich, a forest ranger, and Simon Wangai, a former lumberman, met when Rotich spotted Wangai cutting down a tree in a protected forest.
snippet: Kenyan marathon runners Hosea Rotich, a forest ranger, and Simon Wangai, a former lumberman, met when Rotich spotted Wangai cutting down a tree in a protected forest.
